response.job_title:
M.Sc Infrastructure Planning
Post Graduate Degree in Project Evaluation and Management
BA. Civil Engineer
response.summary: Laura Martinez is a Civil Engineer with a Specialization in Project Management and a Master's Degree in Infrastructure Planning. She is currently a member of the Institute of Railways and Transport at the University of Stuttgart and is a PhD candidate at the same institute. The main objective of her research is defining the conditions under which ETCS Level 3 (moving block operation) could outperform fixed block operation for existing railway systems.
response.skills: Microsoft Excel, AutoCAD, Gestión de proyectos, Ingeniería, Planeamiento de proyectos, Microsoft Project, Matlab, Ingeniería civil, Inglés, Planificación estratégica, Liderazgo de equipos, Investigación y desarrollo, HYPACK, Geotextiles, Obras Hidráulicas, Alemán, Microsoft Office, Construcción, Microsoft Word, Programacion de obra
